price: Yemwe bantu! Mu by’ukuri isezerano rya Allah ni ukuri. Bityo rero ubuzima bw’isi ntibuzabarangaze, kandi rwose Shitani ntizabashuke (ngo ibakure mu nzira ya) Allah.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِنَّ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٞۖ فَلَا تَغُرَّنَّكُمُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَلَا يَغُرَّنَّكُم بِٱللَّهِ ٱلۡغَرُورُ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nāsu inna waʿda al-lahi ḥaqqun falā taghurrannakumu al-ḥayatu al-dun'yā walā yaghurrannakum bil-lahi al-gharūru
